ri:Resource.title: ST-ECF Hubble Space Telescope Images

content.subject: HST Images (ST-ECF)
content.description: Images (science frames only) from the classical HST archive hosted at ST-ECF/ESO. The frames are calibrated and stored in the HST Cache for immediate access. The ST-ECF HST archive interface can be accessed at http://archive.eso.org/hst/science The VOTable contains a Footprint resource that can be interpreted by the votools Aladin and VirGO.
